briefdescription.para: Model that computes the atmospheric wind as a function of position and time.
Shape model of central body, used in computation of altitude that is required for wind calculation.
Map of current angles, as calculated by previous call to update( ) function.
Map of current transformation quaternions, as calculated since previous call to update( ) function.
Current airspeed-based body-fixed state of vehicle, as set by previous call to update( ).
Current groundspeed-based body-fixed state of vehicle, as set by previous call to update( ).
Current rotation from central-body-corotating to inertial frame, as set by previous call to update( ).
Vehicle state in a frame fixed w.r.t. the central body.

detaileddescription.para: Vehicle state in a frame fixed w.r.t. the central body. Note that this state is w.r.t. the body itself, not w.r.t. the local atmosphere

briefdescription.para: Function returning the quaternion that rotates from the corotating to the inertial frame.
Name of central body w.r.t. which the angles are computed.

detaileddescription.para: Boolean to determine whether to determine vertical <-> aerodynamic frame conversion when calling update function.

briefdescription.para: Function to determine the angle of attack of the vehicle.
Function to determine the angle of sideslip of the vehicle.
Function to determine the bank angle of the vehicle.
Function to update the bank, attack and sideslip angles to current time.
Current time to which the bank, attack and sideslip angles have been updated.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::function< Eigen::Vector6d() > bodyFixedStateFunction, const std::function< Eigen::Quaterniond() > rotationFromCorotatingToInertialFrame, const std::string centralBodyName, const bool calculateVerticalToAerodynamicFrame=false, const std::function< double() > angleOfAttackFunction=std::function< double() >(), const std::function< double() > angleOfSideslipFunction=std::function< double() >(), const std::function< double() > bankAngleFunction=std::function< double() >(), const std::function< void(const double) > angleUpdateFunction=std::function< void(const double) >())
memberdef.name: AerodynamicAngleCalculator

briefdescription.para: Constructor.

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor.
bodyFixedStateFunction
Vehicle state in a frame fixed w.r.t. the central body. Note that this state is w.r.t. the body itself, not w.r.t. the local atmosphere.
rotationFromCorotatingToInertialFrame
Function returning the quaternion that rotates from the corotating to the inertial frame.
centralBodyName
Name of central body w.r.t. which the angles are computed.
calculateVerticalToAerodynamicFrame
Boolean to determine whether to determine vertical <-> aerodynamic frame conversion when calling update function.
angleOfAttackFunction
Function to determine the angle of attack of the vehicle.
angleOfSideslipFunction
Function to determine the angle of sideslip of the vehicle.
bankAngleFunction
Function to determine the bank angle of the vehicle.
angleUpdateFunction
Function to update the aerodynamic angles to the current time (default none).

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::shared_ptr< aerodynamics::WindModel > windModel, const std::shared_ptr< basic_astrodynamics::BodyShapeModel > shapeModel)
memberdef.name: setWindModel

briefdescription.para: Function to set the atmospheric wind model.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to set the atmospheric wind model
windModel
Model that computes the atmospheric wind as a function of position and time
shapeModel
Shape model of central body, used in computation of altitude that is required for wind calculation

briefdescription.para: Function to get the current rotation from the global (propagation/inertial) to the local (body-fixed) frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to get the current rotation from the global (propagation/inertial) to the local (body-fixed) frame. Implementation of pure virtual base class function, calls getRotationQuaternionBetweenFrames function.
Current rotation from the global (propagation/inertial) to the local (body-fixed) frame.

briefdescription.para: Function to get the current rotation from the local (body-fixed) to the global (propagation/inertial) frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to get the current rotation from the local (body-fixed) to the global (propagation/inertial) frame. Implementation of pure virtual base class function, calls getRotationQuaternionBetweenFrames function.
Current rotation from the local (body-fixed) to the global (propagation/inertial) frame.

briefdescription.para: Function to update the orientation angles to the current state.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to update the orientation angles to the current state, implements base class pure virtual function; calls update function. Note, when calling this function, the bank angle, angle of attack and sideslip angle are NOT updated (due to possible cross-dependency with aerodynamic coefficients).
AerodynamicAngleCalculator::update

briefdescription.para: Function to update the orientation angles to the current state.

detaileddescription.para:
This function updates all requires orientation angles to the current state of the vehicle. The current state is retrieved from the bodyFixedStateFunction_ member variable function pointer.
currentTime
Time to which angle calculator is to be updated.
updateBodyOrientation
Boolean denoting whether the trajectory<->body-fixed angles are to be updated.

briefdescription.para: Function to get the rotation quaternion between two frames.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to get the rotation quaternion between two frames. This function uses the values calculated by the previous call of the update( ) function.
originalFrame
Id for 'current' frame
targetFrame
Id for frame to which transformation object should transfrom a vector (from originalFrame).
Rotation quaternion from originalFrame to targetFrame.

briefdescription.para: Function to get a single orientation angle.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to get a single orientation angle, as calculated by previous call to update( ) function.
angleId
Id of requested angle.
Value of requested angle.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::function< double() > angleOfAttackFunction=std::function< double() >(), const std::function< double() > angleOfSideslipFunction=std::function< double() >(), const std::function< double() > bankAngleFunction=std::function< double() >(), const std::function< void(const double) > angleUpdateFunction=std::function< void(const double) >())
memberdef.name: setOrientationAngleFunctions

briefdescription.para: Function to set the trajectory<->body-fixed orientation angles.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to set the trajectory<->body-fixed orientation angles.
angleOfAttackFunction
Function to return the angle of attack.
angleOfSideslipFunction
Function to return the angle of sideslip.
bankAngleFunction
Function to return the bank angle.
angleUpdateFunction
Function to update the angles to the current time.

memberdef.argsstring: (const double angleOfAttack=TUDAT_NAN, const double angleOfSideslip=TUDAT_NAN, const double bankAngle=TUDAT_NAN)
memberdef.name: setOrientationAngleFunctions

briefdescription.para: Function to set constant trajectory<->body-fixed orientation angles.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to set constant trajectory<->body-fixed orientation angles.
angleOfAttack
Constant angle of attack (default NaN, used if no angle is to be defined).
angleOfSideslip
Constant angle of sideslip (default NaN, used if no angle is to be defined).
bankAngle
Constant bank angle (default NaN, used if no angle is to be defined).

briefdescription.para: Function to get the function returning the quaternion that rotates from the corotating to the inertial frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to get the function returning the quaternion that rotates from the corotating to the inertial frame.
Function returning the quaternion that rotates from the corotating to the inertial frame.

briefdescription.para: Function to get the name of central body w.r.t. which the angles are computed.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to get the name of central body w.r.t. which the angles are computed.

briefdescription.para: Function to get the current airspeed-based body-fixed state of vehicle, as set by previous call to update( ).

detaileddescription.para:
Function to get the current airspeed-based body-fixed state of vehicle, as set by previous call to update( ).
Current airspeed-based body-fixed state of vehicle, as set by previous call to update( ).

briefdescription.para: Function to reset the value of the currentBodyAngleTime_ variable.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to reset the value of the currentBodyAngleTime_ variable. Typically used to reset the time to NaN, signalling the need to recompute all quantities upon the next relevant function call.
currentTime
New current time.

briefdescription.para: Object to calculate aerodynamic orientation angles from current vehicle state.

detaileddescription.para: Object to calculate aerodynamic orientation angles from current vehicle state.
